div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimosexto
die mensis Septembris Anno quosupra

Eodem die Thomas Narne conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Alexandrj
Rede prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio Willelmi blytht cuj emendabit vt
Jura volunt Et Idem Willelmus quitus de perturbio dictj thome Insuper
deliberatus fuit per dictam assisam vtraque parte obligata ad standum eorum delibera
cioni quod dictus thomas soluet ad lumen sanctj Sanguinis vnam libram Cere
Et si In postrum dictus thomas prefatum Willelmum aut aliquem de carnificio
Impostrum perturbauerit soluet fabrice ecclesie vigintj solidos

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' thome fyf forspekar'
that Dauy theman and his wif margaret of crafurde sale preiwe sufficientlie
befor the alridman and balyeis that margaret Inglis pavndit and laid the siluer
pece follouit be Jhone of Cullane In wede to the said' margaret for certane
clatht extending to and nocht lent it to the said margaret crafurd' to
drink wyne Ande the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to the
saide Dauid theman and his Spous' to preiwe the saide thing

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo
die mensis Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day alexander prat protestit for ane lauchfull day to be
gevin to him Anent the preiwe of ane Siluer belt follouit
be Dauy colp In the nayme of the douchtir and ayr of vmquhill
Williame of buchane

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis Assignit to Alexander prat this
day xv dais the xiiij day of October next to Cum to preiwe
how mekill the belt follouit be Dauy colp tutor to the ayr'
of vmquhill William of buchane was laid' to him in wede and
to ansuer for ane Siluer spvne and for ij yeris male extending to sex merkis
and to bring his assedacion' and richtis of the land' that he Inhabitis

The said' day sere Johne litstar deponit be his aithe that he saw and herde
margaret Inglis by ane pece of tanny clath fra margaret crafurd'
the spous' of Dauy theman and laid' to hir ane Siluer pece of Johne
of Cullanis in wede for the said' clath and scho skathit him ij s' of
Ilkan eln' becaus' scho maid' the first price

the said' day thomas meldrum deponit be his aithe that he saw and
herde margaret Inglis by ane pece of tanny clatht fra margaret
crafurd the spous' of Dauy theman and laid' to hir ane Siluer pece
of Johne of Cullanis in wede for the said' clath

the said' day Sandy talyour brothir to Dauy talyour deponit that he
saw margaret Inglis in Dauy themannis hous' and scho saide
scho hed bocht ane pece of clatht fra margaret crafurd' and scho
hed ane Siluer pece to lay in wede for it bot he saw nocht
the pece

The saide day it was funding that Dauy theman and margaret crafurd'
his Spous' hed' preuit Sufficientlie that margaret Inglis hed' pandit
and laid' in wede to margaret crafurde the spous' forsaide the siluer
pece follouit be Johne of Cullane of his avne for certane clatht
eftir the tenor of the Act maid' tharupon' obefor

The saide day Williame Wormet grantit that he was Souerte
to the officiaris to haue entirit Dauy Ruthirfurd' to ths day
and he trastit he suld' haue cumyn' and he said' to the aldirman and
the balyeis that he suld' entir him one monunday the thrid'
day of October' next to Cum

The said' day the assis' with avis' and consent of the aldirman
and balyeis continevit the borghe' fundin be Johne of cullan
of apon' margaret crafurd' spous' of Dauy theman for the
wranguis haldin fra him of ane Siluer pece et cetera to this
day aucht dais the vij day of October next to Cum

The saide day Johne of Cullane disassentit to the continuacioun
of the borghe' follouit be him for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of his siluer pece be margaret of craufurde and
protestit for Remede of law

div.head: Hed Court
div.p:
Curia Capitalis Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
Quarto die mensis octobris Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo Secundo
Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent et cetera

Eodem die Alexandro Menyheis Electus fuit in officium prepositure
pro Anno Instante prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die Thomas lesly Jacobus Collisoun' Johannes mar et Dauid
mar Electj fuerunt in officium balliuorum pro Anno Instantj prestitis
Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die g Willelmus Scrimgeour Andreas nachtie gilbertus prestone
et Johannes Cuk Electj fuerunt in officium sergeandorum pro Anno
Instantj prestitis Solitis Juramentis

div.head: gild' Court
div.p:
Curia gilde tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene Septimo die mensis octobris
Anno quo supra

Eodem die gilbertus Menyheis et andreas Cullane Electj fuerunt decani
gilde pro Anno Instantj prestitis Solitis Juramentis

head.add: Auditores compoti decanorum gilde de anno Elapse

div.p:
Eodem Robertus blinseile Johannes Cullane alexander Reid Johannes
Wormet andreas murray Willelmus futhes et alexander gray Electj fuerunt
Auditores compoti decanorum gilde anno elapse

div.head: Consilium
div.p:
Johannes leslie de Warderis dominus Johannes ruthirfurde miles Robertus blinsele Dauid
menyeis Johannes Cullane Alexander chamer alexander rede Johannes Knollis Johannes Colisone Alexander
mar Johannes Wormet Willelmus chamer Andreas murray thomas Waus Willelmus futhes
Alexander gray Willelmus blinsele matheus branche Willelmus murray Johannes blak Robertus crag
Dauid Steuart Duncanus Colisone patricius Rede Johannes grig

Eodem die Johannes litstar per confessionem lingue propre pro perturbio
Jacobi Collisoun' balliuj fuit in amerciamento Curie cuj emendabit vt
Jura volunt quodquid perturbium Idem balliuus asseruit se non sustinusse
pro Centum libris protestando pro Juris Remedio et cetera

div.head: Appreciatores Carnium
div.p:
Patricius Reid
Willelmus murray
gilbertus litster
Willelmus andirsone
Richardus litster
Johannes murray
Jacobus Kennerty
gilbertus Riburne
Johannes Chamer
Johannes Duncansone
Johannes thomsone
Johannes Waus
Johannes auchneive
Willelmus lard
Symon Elloun'
Johannes crukschank
Gustatores seruicie
Johannes Cuk sergeandis philippus clerk et thomas Riddaile
Andreas nachtie sergeandus Johannes Colly et Duncanus bischop
Willelmus Scrimgeour sergeandus gilbertus Tulideff et alexander Stablair
gilbertus prestoun' sergeandus Alexander moreson' et gilbertus paule

Eodem die Dauid menyes Alexander chavmer gilbertus menyes Alexander mar Andreas murray Willelmus
futhes patricius rede matheus branche Johannes grig Johannes blak Johannes thomsone Johannes
auchneiwe Willelmus Kintor patricius chernside et alexander malisson' burgenses dicti burgi
Jurati dicunt quod quondam gilbertus Waus de many auus gilberti Waus latoris
presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et saisitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de terris et annuis redditu subscriptis valet de quadam terra suis Jacente in vico
le chakirraw inter terram Alexandri mar' ex boreali ex vna et communionem viam regiam
ex australi partibus ab altera et communiem viam regiam versus oriens et terram quondam
et croftum Dauid mar' ex boreali parte et communiem viam regiam qua Itur ad pontem latronum versus oriens Andree atkin versus occidens Et de quod' crofto Jacente ad finem vici furcarum
castri inter croftum quoddam Willelmi leitht de bernis ex australi in parte vie regie inter croftum
fratrem carmalitarum dicti burgi ex occidentali et aliud croftum quod tenet et occu
piat Andreas ancroft ex orientali
Et alio crofto Jacente ex boreali australi
parte vie regie qua Itur ad le crabstane inter croftum quondam Ricardi
Kintor ex borali et croftum fratrem carmelitarum versus oriens et occidens et
Et de vno alio crofto Jacente propre le crabstane ex boreali parte vie regie ex australi et crofto quondam Ricardi Kintor ex boreali et croftum fratrem carmelitarum versus oriens et occidens
Et de vno annuo Redditu duorum solidorum de terra quondam Roberti Cullan
Jacente ex portam vici furcarum inter terram quondam Johannis Scherar' ex australi
et terram Willelmi Wricht ex boreali et Communiones vias regias versus oriens et
occidens Et quod dictus gilbertus est legittims et propinquior heres dicti quondam
gilberti auj suj de dictis terris croftis et annuo Redditu cum pertinenciis Et quod
est legittime etatis Et quod dicte terre et crofte cum pertinenciis vallent nunc
per annum et valuerunt tempore pacis Et quod dicti
terre crofta et annuus Redditus Cum pertinenciis tenentur in capite de
Supprimo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existunt' in manibus
domini nostri Regis per decessum dicti quondam gilberti auj suj per Spacium
aut eocirca In defectu viri heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis
datis et clausis

Idem Jurati dicunt quod quondam cristoferus litstar frater Richardi litstar latoris
presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter
terram quondam Johannis portar ex australi ex vna et terram Alexander matheson' ex boreali partibus ab
altera et communiem viam regiam versus oriens et latum dicti burgi versus occidens Et quod dicte
Richardus est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam cristoferj fratris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est
legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xl s' et valuit duas marcas tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Supprimo Domino nostri Rege per seruicium burgagium et nunc
existit In manibus cristine Iruyne Relicte quondam dicti cristoferj racione conuicte' Infeodacionis
datis et clausis

The saide day Dauy mar' yongar one that ane part and mariory club and club
Sistiris tile vmquhile Dauid club one that vthir part was oblist and Suorne the gret
bodely aithe tile abide stande and vndirlie the ordinance and finale decret of Johne
Cullan Alexander Rede and Androw Cullane anent the richt of ane lande debatabill
betuix tham liande in the gallougat and the saidez Johne and Androw was che suorne
the gret aithe and the saide Dauid oblist him to caus' the saide alexander Rede to suer'
and determe in the said matir and falyeing of him to caus' patry Rede be suorne
in the samyn quhilkis thre persovnis sale giffurtht thar' finale decret in the
saide matir betuix this and monunday xv dais hereftir be thar aithis and conscience

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis octobris
anno quo supra

The saide day Johne grig fande ane borghe' that Johne massy wranguslie withhelde fra
him v s' of Siluer and Androw body Sourte for the entires' of the saide Johne tuk to
ansuer' for him and Reseruit It to the aithe of the saide Johne grig and to avis' witht
his wyf and depone one friday that nixt cumis

Johannes leslie de Warderis Dauid menyes gilbertus menyes Androw Cullan thomas Waus Willelmus
Kintor Willelmus nicholsone Johannis Auchneyve Johannes thomsone Johannes Murray Richardus Waus patricius
andirsone cristinus prat et Willelmus Rolland burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Andreas peterkin
frater Agnetis peterkin Obiit ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis Et quod dicta Agnes est legittima
et propinquior heres dicti quondam Andree sponse suj Et quod est legittime etatis et cetera Ceteri puncti breuis
patent quia non suit terre neque annuj Redditus

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiudem xiiijo
die mensis Octobris anno quo Supra

The saide day gilbert tulidef be his avne tong gravnt was
in Ane Amerciament of the court for the breking of the pas' xv
the tua demi leyf les' than his nychtbouris bred' and In breking of
common ordinance and to Amend' as law will and forber' in tym
to Cum

The said' day the Action' debatabile betuix Dauid colp tutor
to the ayr of William buchane and Alexander Prat Anent ane siluer
belt j siluer spvne and ij yeris maile of ane hous' and Anent
the tak of the hous' as is contenit in the act maid' obefor
with consent of batht the partiis is continevit in hop of
concord' to this day viij dais but preiudice of ony
party

The said' day gilbert tulidef was conuict be ane Suorne
assis' Dauid menyes forspekar for the baking and Selling
of bred of quhet in doubill pas' nocht ane kepand'
the Juste pas'

The said' day ale the baxtaris of this burghe' conuict
be ane Suorne assis' Dauid menyes forspekar for
the breking of common ordinance in wantin of bred'
to serue the toune and nocht kepand' the Richt and Juste
pas' thir ar' the namys of the baxtaris William buchan
thome bichane Richard' Redehede the widew of patry
clerk Donalde baxtar Donald' baxtar Wat sayfray

The saide day It was Statut' and ordanit be the aldirman
and counsal that for the trespas' committit be gilbert tulidef him in brekin of
common' ordinance and statutis of the toune that he sal pay
viij s' to Sanct nicholes werk or he pas' furtht of the
tolbutht Ande he sale fynde Souerte to the balyeis or euire
he baik that he sal keip the Statutis of the tovne In
tym' to Cum Ande gif he falyes his Souerte sal ansuer
for the saide xl s' to the towne in Sanctis nayme to his
werk and he to freithe his Souerte

The saide day It was statutit and ordanit be the aldirman and
counsale that ale the baxtaris of this burghe baik tua penny
breid' contening xxxiiij vnce and penny brede contening xvij vnce
gude and cleyne tuff fresche and weilbakin Ande haue Redy
sic Stuff to the furnising and seruing of the towne vndir the pane
of law to be execut on thame and brekin of Commoun ordinance

The saide day It was Statutit and ordanit be the aldirman and counsale
that ale the candilmakaris of this burghe sale haue and make candill
cleyn' talche smale and dry wekit the pvnde in maid' candill to
be Sellit for iij d' in wecht and to haue ay Redy Stuf to serue
the tone vndir the pane of law to be execut apoun' tham and vndir the
pane of common ordinance

The saide day It was Statute and ordanit be the aldirmane ande counsale
that ale the broustaris of this burghe' that ar' free sale brew and sell
gude and Sufficient provabill ayle for vj d' the galloun' and vnfre broxasteris
sale brew and sele Sufficient ayle for iiijor the gallon' and sel nayn' quhil It be
cumit and Set vndir the pane of law and brekin of common ordinance to be execut on'
thame
